mapper.select: SELECT m1.menu_idx AS depth1_idx, m1.menu_name AS depth1_name, m1.url AS depth1_url, m1.role AS depth1_role, m2.menu_idx AS depth2_idx, m2.menu_name AS depth2_name, m2.url AS depth2_url, m2.role AS depth2_role FROM menu m1 LEFT JOIN menu m2 ON m1.menu_idx = m2.parent_idx AND m2.use_yn = 'Y' AND m2.`depth` = 2 WHERE m1.depth = 1 AND m1.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY m1.menu_order, m2.menu_order
